chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
i: nat
n: nat
H: i < n

Goal:
pos2nat (nat2pos H) = i

Premises:
nat2pos : forall n x : nat, x < n -> pos n
pos2nat : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat
pos2nat_inj : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), pos2nat p = pos2nat q -> p = q
Fin.to_nat_of_nat : forall h : ?p < ?n, Fin.to_nat (Fin.of_nat_lt h) = exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < ?n) ?p h where ?p : [n : nat i : nat H : i < n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat i : nat H : i < n |- nat]
NoDup_nth_error : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), NoDup l < -> (forall i j : nat, i < length l -> nth_error l i = nth_error l j -> i = j)
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : pos ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [n : nat i : nat H : i < n |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat i : nat H : i < n |- nat]
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : pos m) {struct n} : {i : nat | i < m} := match n in (pos n0) return {i : nat | i < n0} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => i < S j) 0 (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < S n0) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, pos m -> {i : nat | i < m} Arguments Fin.to_nat {m}%nat_scope
NoDup_nth : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (d : A), NoDup l < -> (forall i j : nat, i < length l -> j < length l -> nth i l d = nth j l d -> i = j)
pos2nat_prop : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), pos2nat p < n
nat_pos : forall n : nat, {i : nat | i < n} -> pos n
pos_nat : forall n : nat, pos n -> {i : nat | i < n}
PeanoNat.Nat.lt_wd_obligation_1 = fun (x y : nat) (H : x = y) (x0 y0 : nat) (H0 : x0 = y0) => eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => x < x1 <-> y < y0) (eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => x1 < y0 <-> y < y0) (conj (fun H1 : y < y0 => H1) (fun H1 : y < y0 => H1)) H) H0 : Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) lt lt
gt = fun n m : nat => m < n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gt (_ _)%nat_scope
FinFun.bInjective = fun (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) => forall x y : nat, x < n -> y < n -> f x = f y -> x = y : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> Prop Arguments FinFun.bInjective _%nat_scope _%function_scope
FinFun.bSurjective = fun (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) => forall y : nat, y < n -> exists x : nat, x < n /\ f x = y : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> Prop Arguments FinFun.bSurjective _%nat_scope _%function_scope
Nat.min_unicity_ext : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall n m : nat, n < m /\ f n m = n \/ m <= n /\ f n m = m) -> forall n m : nat, f n m = Nat.min n m
Nat.max_unicity_ext : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall n m : nat, n < m /\ f n m = m \/ m <= n /\ f n m = n) -> forall n m : nat, f n m = Nat.max n m
Nat.ones = fun n : nat => Nat.pred (Nat.shiftl 1 n) : nat -> nat Arguments Nat.ones _%nat_scope
Nat.lnot = fun a n : nat => Nat.lxor a (Nat.ones n) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.lnot (_ _)%nat_scope
FinFun.bFun = fun (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) => forall x : nat, x < n -> f x < n : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> Prop Arguments FinFun.bFun _%nat_scope _%function_scope
Init.Nat.sqrt = fun n : nat => Init.Nat.sqrt_iter n 0 0 0 : nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.sqrt _%nat_scope
Init.Nat.land = fun a b : nat => Init.Nat.bitwise andb a a b : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.land (_ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.log2 = fun n : nat => Init.Nat.log2_iter (Init.Nat.pred n) 0 1 0 : nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.log2 _%nat_scope
Init.Nat.lor = fun a b : nat => Init.Nat.bitwise orb (Init.Nat.max a b) a b : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.lor (_ _)%nat_scope
lt = fun n m : nat => S n <= m : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments lt (_ _)%nat_scope
Ascii.ascii_of_nat = fun a : nat => Ascii.ascii_of_N (BinNat.N.of_nat a) : nat -> Ascii.ascii Arguments Ascii.ascii_of_nat _%nat_scope
Fin.of_nat_lt = fix of_nat_lt (p n : nat) {struct p} : p < n -> pos n := match n as n0 return (p < n0 -> pos n0) with | 0 => fun H : p < 0 => False_rect (pos 0) (Nat.nlt_0_r p H) | S n' => match p as p0 return (p0 < S n' -> pos (S n')) with | 0 => fun _ : 0 < S n' => pos0 | S p' => fun H : S p' < S n' => pos_nxt (of_nat_lt p' n' (lt_S_n p' n' H)) end end : forall p n : nat, p < n -> pos n Arguments Fin.of_nat_lt {p n}%nat_scope
FinFun.bSurjective_bBijective : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), FinFun.bFun n f -> FinFun.bSurjective n f -> exists g : nat -> nat, FinFun.bFun n g /\ (forall x : nat, x < n -> g (f x) = x /\ f (g x) = x)
Init.Nat.ldiff = fun a b : nat => Init.Nat.bitwise (fun b0 b' : bool => (b0 && negb b')%bool) a a b : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.ldiff (_ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.pred = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => n | S u => u end : nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.pred _%nat_scope
Init.Nat.div = fun x y : nat => match y with | 0 => y | S y' => fst (Init.Nat.divmod x y' 0 y') end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.div (_ _)%nat_scope
